channel.title: Un RIC, 3 Convictions on Quant Au RIC
channel.description: Recent content in Un RIC, 3 Convictions on Quant Au RIC

item.title: Première conviction : Le RIC peut réunir les Français
item.description: Prerequisites Firstly, ensure you have installed the extended version of Hugo. See installation steps from Hugo's official docs. Getting up and running Read the prerequisites above and verify you're using the extended version of Hugo. There are at least two ways of quickly getting started with Hugo and the VMware Clarity theme: Option 1 (recommended) Generate a new Hugo site and add this theme as a Git submodule inside your themes folder:
